mapper.select: select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.first_picture, b.update_time, b.create_time, b.description, b.user_id, t.id as tid, t.`name`, u.id as uid, u.email, u.avatar, u.username,u.sign from t_blog b left join t_tag_blog m on m.blog_id = b.id left join t_tag t on t.id = m.tag_id left join t_user u on u.id = b.user_id where b.id = #{id}

select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.first_picture, b.update_time, b.create_time, b.description, b.user_id, t.id as tid, t.`name`, u.id as uid, u.email, u.avatar, u.username, u.sign from t_blog b left join t_tag_blog m on m.blog_id = b.id left join t_tag t on t.id = m.tag_id left join t_user u on u.id = b.user_id where (b.title = #{query} or t.name = #{query} or b.content like concat('%', #{query}, '%'))
